titleStmt.title: Some remarks upon the life of that painful servant of God, Mr. Nathanael Heywood minister of the Gospel of Christ ... who died in the 44th year of his age ... / by Sir H. Ashurst.
titleStmt.author: Ashurst, Henry, 1614?-1680.

notesStmt.note: Running title: The life and death of Mr. Nathanael Heywood.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
